name: HTMLQuoteElement
description: The HTMLQuoteElement interface provides special properties and methods (beyond the regular HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating quoting elements, like blockquote and q, but not the cite element.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLQuoteElement' in HTML Living Standard.
